m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Canada Paris climate change conference: Highlights from Day 4 Al Gore’s warning to investors, cleaner buildings, electric cars and Anonymous highlight day four at the Paris climate conference. Former U.S. vice-president Al Gore told the United Nations conference on climate change in France that investors better dump their shares in fossil fuel companies, "lest they be trapped holding stranded assets."   (PATRICK KOVARIK / AFP/GETTY IMAGES)   By Tyler Hamilton Climate and Economy Reporter Thu., Dec. 3, 2015 Protect your portfolio, dump coal and oil: Al Gore Form
